name: "Prepercolator"
description: An application for creating and storing coffee drinks. Intended for use by small cafes to help digitize their menus, and allow customers to customize orders more easily.

name: "BattleBrands"
description: A micro-game, meant to mimic the pocket digital pets popular in the 90's. The application was built in Node.js using a MySql database.

name: "Hop'r"
description: An application that uses geolocation and the OpenBreweryDB.org API to randomly shuffle through local brewery options.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: This micro-application was developed for the UW Coding Bootcamp, leveraging thew OpenWeatherMap.org API to display a forecast for selected locations.
